description: Lightweight, breathable, and ready to shield you from unruly weather, this must-have jacket is a fan-favorite for a reason. Fully wind- and waterproof with a GORE-TEX PACLITE® membrane, its feature list includes everything from pit zips and zippered pockets to an adjustable hem, hood and cuffs. Combining high packability with a notably soft hand-feel, this classic 2.5-layer shell is a solid choice for any hike.
name: Mammut Convey Tour HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
